item.title: No, 26th October
item.description:
Additional traffic light installed: Large roadworks allowing buses to stop when prospective passengers cannot be seen due to excessive pavement signs announcing roadworks. No “buses not stopping” advice on bus stop. Workman advised not received advice that buses will not stop. Causing chaos.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crook Log, Welling, London

item.title: Outside 32 Leather Lane, 26th October
item.description:
The lamp post requires cleaning urgently. It is causing a safety issue and needs an immediate attention. The lamp post is covered in cooking grease from the Leather Lane street market with accumulated dusts and debris over many years. The oily debris started to fall onto people and leave oil marks on our walls and windows. Recently I had to go to an eye hospital after I got the debris in my eyes. I needed to use eye drops to prevent eye infections.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leather Lane, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves covering the street making it hard to walk, 26th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doddington Grove, Elephant and Castle, London
